title: Adopt blue-green database migration approach
context: Schema changes have caused downtime during releases. We need a safer path for migrations.
motivation: Reduce deployment risk and improve rollback capability.

alternatives_considered.name: Continue in-place migrations
alternatives_considered.why_not: Downtime during releases is unacceptable for enterprise customers.

alternatives_considered.name: Blue-green migrations
alternatives_considered.why_not: Selected option; provides safe cutover with data validation steps.

assumptions: DB capacity can handle duplicate tables
